full_text:
TIMETABLE AND SCHEDULE OF ACTIVITIES FOR THE EDO AND ONDO STATE GOVERNORSHIP ELECTIONS

[Note: The provided HTML content appears to be primarily an image-based document containing multiple images of what seems to be an official election timetable/schedule. The text content is minimal, with only the header "TIMETABLE AND SCHEDULE OF ACTIVITIES FOR THE EDO AND ONDO STATE GOVERNORSHIP ELECTIONS" being present. There is also a reference to the "Next Election: Ondo State Governorship Elections-16th November 2024" in the countdown timer section.]

The large number of images in the HTML suggest this is a visual document showing detailed election activities, but the text extraction cannot reproduce the visual schedule content. The actual details would need to be derived from examining the images directly.
title: INEC had in 2023 set the date for the Ondo state off-cycle elections for November 2024. The date has since announcement not been changed or adjusted.
vclaim: The Edo and Ondo State governorship elections have official timetables and schedules of activities planned. The Ondo State Governorship Election is scheduled for November 16, 2024.
